title: Patanjali Foods moves Bombay High Court over land encroachments in Raigad
content: Company seeks Writ of Mandamus against authorities for inaction on alleged unauthorised structures near factory site

title: Air India Ahmedabad plane crash: Grief-stricken kin give DNA samples to identify victims
content: Tragic scenes unfold at Ahmedabad’s Civil Hospital as relatives wait to give DNA samples; for many, in the U.K. and India, celebrations and joy had turned into tragedy

title: Four students fall ill at Government Adi Dravidar hostel in Vaniyambadi after breakfast
content: Chief Educational Officer R. Punniyakotti, revenue officials and Vaniyambadi Town police inspected the hostel, kitchen and other facilities

title: Levelling unsubstantiated sexual charges against husband, father-in-law amounts to mental cruelty, says Madras High Court
content: Justices J. Nisha Banu and R. Sakthivel allow an appeal preferred by the husband and reverse a Family Court’s 2023 order refusing to grant divorce to a couple

title: High Court concerned over plastic pollution in waterbodies
content: The court says that the Kochi Corporation can no longer rely on the excuse that waste is piling up in the city due to lack of infrastructure to dispose it of

title: Man accused in two cases involving ganja arrested under PITNDPS Act
content: He was an accused in two Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances (NDPS) cases involving commercial quantities of ganja, registered by the Ernakulam Central and Kalamassery police

title: Film producer Akash Baskaran moves Madras High Court to declare ED’s search and seizure operation illegal
content: Justices M.S. Ramesh and V. Lakshminarayanan grant time till June 17 for the ED to respond to the cases filed by him as well as his friend Vikram Ravindran

title: Stalin requests Delhi Chief Minister to support Tamil families displaced from ‘Madrasi Camp’
content: A delegation comprising Sriperumbudur MP T.R. Baalu, Tamil Nadu’s Special Representative in New Delhi A.K.S. Vijayan, and Resident Commissioner of Tamil Nadu House in Delhi Ashish Kumar handed over Mr. Stalin’s letter to Ms. Gupta in the national capital on Friday

title: Keeladi findings don’t serve the script of ‘BJP-RSS ecosystem’, says Chief Minister M.K. Stalin
content: He was responding after Union Minister for Culture Gajendra Singh Shekhawat contended that the findings from Keeladi were not technically well-supported a few days

title: Waqf Amendment Act was passed without political ethics or moral fear, says VCK chief
content: Addressing a meeting organised by the All India Muslim Personal Law Board demanding the repeal of the amended legislation, he says the BJP has used the power of the government to target the Islamic community in the name of law and democracy over the last 11 years

title: Newly-wed Vadodara man among victims of Air India crash
content: Family had planned a ceremonial celebration upon his return from London; grief overwhelms Vadi locality

title: NDA government in Andhra Pradesh to launch month-long ‘Toli Adugu Vijaya Yatra’ programme from June 23
content: All the TDP activists should take part in the programme and explain to people the achievements of the government, Naidu says in a tele conference

title: J&K leaders condemn Israel for attacking Iran; protest erupts in Kashmir valley
content: CM Omar Abdullah requested the Ministry of External Affairs to ensure the safety of Kashmiri students in Iran; PDP chief Mehbooba Mufti questions ‘deafening silence’ of Muslim countries

title: Air India plane crash shatters newly-married woman's dreams of promising future
content: Ankita Patel got married to Vasant Patel in December last year and had been busy completing the visa process for the last six months to join her husband who runs a provision store in the United Kingdom

title: Nasscom urges Karnataka to extend deadline for bike taxi services, seeks policy framework
content: The industry body calls for an extension of the June 15 deadline imposed by the Karnataka HC, which currently prohibits aggregator-based bike taxi operations in the absence of proper regulations

title: With plane crash, family's excitement for flight attendant Roshni's wedding turns into despair
content: 26-year-old Roshni Songhare pursued and completed a flight attendant course; she began her career with SpiceJet and later joined Air India where she opted for international assignments; she was set to get engaged in November this year

title: Social activists demand impartial probe in constable assault case, allege role of senior police officer’s son
content: The police constable was assaulted and locked inside a police outpost by four youths when he asked them to stop fighting; the assaulters allegedly attacked the constable, tore his uniform, and vandalised government property

title: Operation Chakra-V: CBI arrests one man in cyber-enabled fraud case, conducts searches across four States
content: A fraudulent mobile application and WhatsApp groups were used to trick unsuspecting individuals; searches were carried out in Delhi, Haryana, Uttar Pradesh and Maharashtra

title: Left parties urge govt. to condemn Israel’s air strike on Iran
content: Labelling Israel as a “rogue state”, the Left parties urged the government to join other countries condemning Israel’s action saying that India’s silence amounts to complicity

title: Indore woman advanced travel for husband’s birthday; Gwalior boy killed too
content: Harpreet Hora was scheduled to return to London on June 19, but had preponed her trip to be with her husband on his birthday; Aryan Kirar Rajput, a second-year MBBS student at Ahmedabad’s B.J. Medical College, died when the flight crashed into the hostel mess of the college

title: BJP seeks L-G’s intervention to drop Urdu for Naib Tehsildar posts, sparks political storm
content: Urdu is rooted in Jammu and Kashmir’s history, not in any political or sectarian agenda, says NC leader and MLA Zadibal Tanvir Sadiq

title: Congress asks why Modi continues to be silent even when Trump makes repeated claims about ‘stopping’ the war
content: U.S. has repeatedly claimed to be de-escalating the India-Pakistan conflict, but India maintains that the cessation of hostilities was reached through direct talks between the two countries’ DGMOs

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Couple’s long-awaited family reunion in the U.K. ends in tragedy
content: Pinakin and Rupaben Shah were en route to their son’s housewarming in Glasgow when the Air India flight crashed in Ahmedabad

title: Search continues for woman and child missing after Air India flight crash at B.J. Medical College
content: While most victims have been identified, a cook at the hostel mess and her granddaughter remain untraceable, says kin

title: State govt. has taken policy decision not to frame rules to allow bike taxis, Karnataka High Court told
content: Advocate-General told the bench that only eight States have so far permitted bike taxis across the country

title: 571 new Telangana govt schools will be opened in both rural and urban areas: CM Revanth
content: The education system should include skill development courses in addition to language and subject knowledge, said the CM

title: Air India Ahmedabad plane crash: What are black boxes? How do they work?
content: In modern aircraft, there is a Cockpit Voice Recorder and a Digital Flight Data Recorder; they are called black boxes even though they are painted with bright orange to ensure high visibility; black boxes hold the key to aircraft crash investigations

title: TG CPGET notification released
content: Chairman V. Balakista Reddy informed that 46,742 seats are available in the universities in the State and arrangements are being made for smooth conduct of the test

title: Consultants invited for rationalisation and simplification of building rules
content: The consultant agency will review and benchmark the existing development and building rules along with zoning regulations across Telangana against those of other progressive States in India and select East Asian and European cities

title: CRDA nod for ₹1,052 cr. infrastructure works in Amaravati Govt. Complex area
content: The Capital Region Development Authority meeting chaired by Chief Minister N. Chandrababu Naidu approves the proposal to invite tenders for the works to be undertaken in 1,450 acres; tenders worth ₹682 crore also to be invited for works to connect the Seed Access Road to National Highway-16

title: Row erupts in Bengal over vandalism at Tagore’s ancestral house in Bangladesh
content: Trinamool and BJP spar over incident; Mamata writes to PM, Suvendu calls it attack on shared heritage

title: 311 properties acquired, ₹283 crore disbursed for Old City Metro line
content: There are several challenges involved in carrying out the work in the Old City because of the close proximity of buildings almost touching each other, HAML Managing Director said

title: Roof of Jewish synagogue in Mala collapses in rain
content: As an emergency measure, authorities have begun covering the damaged roof with tarpaulin sheets to prevent rainwater from entering the structure

title: Karnataka seeks hike in devolution of funds from Centre to 50%, more weight to a State’s economic performance
content: Chief Minister Siddaramaiah seeks ₹1.15 lakh crore investment to strengthen Bengaluru’s infrastructure, given its major role in Karnataka’s economy

title: Assam CM orders shoot-at-sight in restive Dhubri
content: The town has been on edge since the severed head of a cow was found in front of a Hanuman temple here on June 8. Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma says a group named Nabin Bangla is campaigning to make Dhubri district a part of Bangladesh

title: A.P. lorry owners oppose proposed hike in third-party insurance premium
content: The move will lay a substantial financial burden on lakhs of small and medium transport operators who are already reeling under heavy taxes and penalties and ever-increasing toll fees and fuel prices, says APLOA in a letter to IRDAI

title: Youth value elders, but digital divide, communication gaps persist: HelpAge India report
content: The report, ‘Understanding Intergenerational Dynamics & Perceptions on Ageing’, released by HelpAge India, sheds light on how ageing is perceived and experienced in modern India. Loneliness, poor health, and financial insecurity emerged as top fears about ageing for both youth and elders.

title: Cargo ship fire: coastal vigil continues amid salvage operations
content: Coastal residents urged to stay alert and immediately report any suspicious objects spotted at sea, while maintaining a distance of at least 200 metres

title: Tribal woman killed in wild elephant attack in Idukki
content: The woman had gone to collect forest produce with her husband and children when they came under attack. Her husband sustained injuries

title: Trinamool seeks transparent probe into Ahmedabad plane crash
content: Party urges against premature theories; calls for investigation by “proper specialists and authorities”

title: Kerala University hosts EU-India TTC networking event on marine pollution and green hydrogen
content: Visiting delegation from TTC engaged in discussions with faculty members and experts to explore collaborative opportunities

title: KAU sending seeds to space on NASA’s Axiom Mission 4
content: The mission will carry seed varieties developed by KAU to the International Space Station as part of a collaborative research initiative

title: ACB notices drama to divert people’s attention from unkept promises: KTR
content: BRS working president asks CM to face a lie detector test along with him to bring facts before people since the two have ACB cases booked against them

title: Study on online child sexual abuse recommends inclusion of digital literacy in school curriculum
content: The study notes that the COVID-19 pandemic significantly increased children’s exposure to online risks, underscoring the urgent need for corrective measures

title: Lokesh threatens legal action on YSRCP post on Talliki Vandanam, seeks apology
content: Either they have to delete the message posted on social media or prove their allegations. Else, law will take its course and they will face consequences, says the HRD Minister

title: Belagavi villagers stage protest in favour of retaining graveyard land
content: They oppose survey saying some people are trying to grab the land by claiming that it was Patta land under private ownership

title: Funds for 15 sewage treatment plantsunder AMRUT scheme
content: Centre’s share of first instalment of ₹5.25 crore for setting up plants released. Plants are being implemented to incentivise urban local bodies to improve the quality of treated used water by ensuring efficient operations of treatment plants and promoting recycling and reuse

title: CM seeks to exploit differences in UDF over Cong.’s overtures to Jamaat-e-Islami in bypoll
content: Satheesan says UDF does not share CPI(M)‘s view that Jamaat-e-Islami is extremist , adding its backing was not anathema for Left party in 2009 Lok Sabha and 2011 Assembly elections

title: Gadag officer visits rain-affected, flood-prone villages
content: ZP CEO Bharath S. reviews the prevailing situation in Asuti, Hole Alur, Menasagi and Amaragol villages in Ron taluk

title: Totapuri mango farmers fear produce will wither soon if not procured
content: Totapuri yield is pegged at a whopping six lakh tonnes this year, however, fruit pulp making units across Tirupati and Chittoor districts are reluctant to procure citing two-year-old produce pile up

title: Centre cannot cite removed Section of DM  Act to deny loan relief: HC
content: Kerala High Court says Centre cannot cite a Section removed from DM Act and cite inability to waive loans of landslides-affected people of Wayanad

title: A.P. Tourism Minister Kandula Durgesh expresses delight over GSI recognition for Belum Caves
content: The caves represent ancient culture and heritage, and including them in the Geological Heritage list will pave the way for development of the region, he says

title: Tyrese Haliburton, Caitlin Clark and the most powerful friendship in basketball
content: From group chats to high-level X's and O's breakdowns, the two superstars have pushed themselves -- and each other -- to the top of the basketball universe.

title: Source: Nuggets' Westbrook to decline option
content: Nuggets guard Russell Westbrook is declining his $3.4 million player option for next season and will become a free agent later this month, a source told ESPN's Shams Charania.

title: Aces star Wilson placed in concussion protocol
content: The Las Vegas Aces placed three-time WNBA MVP A'ja Wilson in the concussion protocol Friday and will miss the team's game against the Dallas Wings.

title: Mexico prez calls for no ICE action at Gold Cup
content: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum urged U.S. authorities not to conduct immigration enforcement targeting attendees of a Gold Cup match in Los Angeles.

title: Civale traded to ChiSox after bullpen pushback
content: The Brewers have traded Aaron Civale, who resisted Milwaukee's attempt to move him to the bullpen, to the White Sox for first baseman Andrew Vaughn.

title: Phils' Turner hails Emmy for film on his '23 ovation
content: Trea Turner celebrated with the Kyle Thrash and Jon McCann, whose film on the 2023 standing ovations that helped turn around Turner's season won a Sports Emmy award for best short documentary.

title: Dak wants Super Bowl title, legacy 'be damned'
content: Cowboys quarterback Dak Prescott says he's focused on winning a championship and not concerned with his legacy.

title: Perez cards 2nd-ever U.S. Open ace at Oakmont
content: France's Victor Perez carded only the second recorded ace in a U.S. Open at Oakmont Country Club on the par-3 sixth hole in Friday's second round.

title: Coastal extends streak to 24, wins MCWS opener
content: Coastal Carolina broke open a tie game with three runs in the eighth inning, Dominick Carbone shut down an Arizona threat in the ninth, and the Chanticleers opened the Men's College World Series with a 7-4 victory Friday.

title: 🏀 NBA offseason buzz: Latest on Giannis, KD
content: What are NBA insiders saying about the biggest offseason storylines? Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst canvass the league.

title: Dodgers desperately need Shohei Ohtani's arm, but his bat will do -- for now
content: The state of L.A.'s injury-riddled pitching staff is alarming. But Ohtani is too valuable to rush back to the mound.

title: The 15 early-round MLB draft prospects to know in the Men's College World Series
content: From UCLA's star shortstop to an LSU pitcher who could go No. 1, here are the future major league stars to watch in Omaha.

title: NFL minicamp updates: Cameron Ward throws some picks, Travis Hunter gets reps at CB and WR
content: The majority of NFL mandatory minicamps are in action this week. Our reporters have the latest from around the league.

title: NFL scouts pick 10 early sleepers for the 2026 draft: Which prospects could rise quickly?
content: We asked NFL evaluators to pick out prospects in next year's draft class who aren't being talked about enough right now. Here are 10 names to know.

title: Vegas got what grade now?! Checking in on all 13 teams
content: Which teams have exceeded expectations and which have fallen short one month into the 2025 season? We have grades and questions.

title: Why the championship window for Caitlin Clark, Fever is narrower than you think
content: After big offseason pickups, the Fever looked like potential title contenders early. Can they get back on track?

title: How George Duangmanee's second round showed the beauty and the harshness of the U.S. Open
content: Duangmanee didn't have the results any golfer would hope for. But he was still playing in the U.S. Open and was going to take the positive out of that.

title: Club World Cup mega-preview: Predictions, what you need to know about all 32 teams
content: Saturday sees the start of the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup, with 32 teams playing 63 games between June 14 and July 13. Here's what you need to know about the teams, their chances, and this competition.

title: Sources: Pogba in talks to return with Monaco
content: Paul Pogba is close to ending his two-year absence from football after opening with AS Monaco over a deal with the Ligue 1 team, sources have told ESPN.

title: Sources: Liverpool agrees to $157M Wirtz deal
content: Liverpool have agreed to sign Bayer Leverkusen's Florian Wirtz in a deal that could rise to a British transfer record fee of £116m, sources have told ESPN.

title: Messi on CWC: Expectations different with Miami
content: Lionel Messi shared that he has different expectations with Inter Miami going into the 2025 Club World Cup than when competing previously with other teams.

title: Source: Barça set to sign keeper García for €25m
content: Barcelona are set to sign Joan García after exercising the Espanyol goalkeeper's €25 million ($28.9 million) release clause, a source has confirmed to ESPN.

title: Sources: Man City yet to receive Grealish offer
content: Manchester City are yet to receive a formal offer for Jack Grealish despite making the England midfielder available for transfer this summer, sources have told ESPN.

title: Frank: 'Left a big piece of my heart in Brentford'
content: Thomas Frank has penned an emotional letter to Brentford following the confirmation of his departure from the club after nine years with the club.

title: Border Patrol will be at Club WC, says it's routine
content: U.S. Customs and Border Protection said it regularly provides security at big sporting events in response to questions about the agency's presence at the FIFA Club World Cup amid President...

title: Six trades you probably missed at the time that have altered the 2025 MLB season
content: These under-the-radar deals range from a young catcher switching sides in a classic rivalry to a key rotation addition on a World Series contender.

title: Is the USMNT anywhere near ready for the World Cup challenge?
content: With 12 months out from the World Cup and with the Gold Cup kicking off this weekend, is the USMNT ready for its moment in the spotlight?

title: Can Amtrak's busy Northeast Corridor handle the 2026 World Cup?
content: The congested stretch from Boston to Washington is already beleaguered by breakdowns and spotty service.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Barça discuss Nico Williams as Bayern, Arsenal circle
content: Barcelona have spoken with Nico Williams' agents to explore a possible deal. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Usman is back with a plan to take on the new generation
content: The former welterweight champion returns to the Octagon against Joaquin Buckley at UFC Fight Night in Atlanta.

title: Air India plane crash: Toll mounts to 274; 33 on-ground deaths confirmed
content: The wreckage of the crashed Air India flight AI 171 in Ahmedabad yielded the aircraft's black box and additional bodies, tragically raising the death toll to 274. Authorities believe some victims were from the nearby BJ Medical College campus. The black box, crucial for determining the cause of the crash, was recovered from the college's mess rooftop.

title: Watch: Iran launches massive missile attack on Israel; explosions rock cities
content: Tensions soar as Iran launches a missile barrage on Israel, retaliating for strikes on its nuclear and military sites. Explosions rocked cities like Tel Aviv and Jerusalem, with many missiles intercepted. Israel's earlier assault, involving numerous aircraft, targeted key Iranian facilities and killed top commanders.

title: AI crash: Govt forms high-powered panel led by Union home secretary
content: Following the Air India flight AI 171 crash, the Modi government has formed a high-level committee, led by the Union home secretary, to investigate the incident's causes. The committee will review existing protocols, assess contributing factors like mechanical failure and human error, and recommend improvements.

title: Israel-Iran war: Netanyahu warns Iran ‘more is on the way’ after Tel Aviv strikes
content: Prime Minister Netanyahu announced Israel's ongoing military offensive against Iran, claiming the destruction of key military and nuclear assets. This operation, dubbed 'Operation Rising Lion,' follows Iran's missile attack on Israeli territory, which Israel views as crossing a red line. Netanyahu urged the Iranian people to rise against their regime, as fears of regional escalation intensify amid the conflict.

title: Microsoft's top executive to software engineers: If you're going to work with AI-generated code, you need…
content: Microsoft executives emphasize the enduring importance of coding skills in the age of AI. Aparna Chennapragada argues that logical and critical thinking, inherent in coding, are crucial for collaborating with AI systems. Satya Nadella highlights the need for computational thinking and structured instruction, envisioning a future where everyone is a software architect.

title: ‘Bring it to ruin’: Iran launches ‘dozens’ of ballistic missiles at Israel
content: Tensions escalate as Iran launches a missile barrage on Israel, retaliating for Israeli strikes on Iranian nuclear sites and the killing of military commanders. Explosions rocked Jerusalem and Tel Aviv, with many missiles intercepted. Iran's Revolutionary Guard claimed responsibility, targeting Israeli military positions. The US had cautioned against strikes that could derail nuclear negotiations.

title: Iran airspace shut, international flights from India to take longer
content: Following Israel's attack and Iran's airspace closure, flights between India and the West are facing significant disruptions. Air India flights are being diverted or returning to their origin, impacting routes to and from cities like London, New York, and Delhi. With both Pakistan and Iran as no-fly zones, Indian carriers will have to take longer routes to reach Central Asia.

title: 'Deeply concerned': India urges Iran & Israel to avoid escalation
content: Following Israel's unprecedented attack on Iran, India has called for dialogue and diplomacy to resolve the escalating tensions in West Asia. Prime Minister Modi, after a call with Israeli PM Netanyahu, expressed India's concerns and emphasized the urgent need for regional peace and stability.

title: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos loses world’s 2nd richest title after 8-long years to….
content: Larry Ellison of Oracle has overtaken Jeff Bezos to become the world's second-richest person, fueled by a $26 billion surge in his net worth following Oracle's strong earnings report. Ellison's total wealth now stands at $243 billion, surpassing Bezos' $227 billion and Mark Zuckerberg's $239 billion. Elon Musk remains the wealthiest individual with $407.3 billion.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Girls, 8 and 4, lose mom and dad within 18 days
content: Arjun Patoliya, 37, tragically died in the AI 171 plane crash, leaving his two young daughters orphaned in London just 18 days after their mother succumbed to cancer. He had traveled to India to fulfill his wife's final wish of having her post-death rituals performed in Gujarat.

title: AI crash: Publish Boeing report immediately, says whistleblower's lawyer to US FAA
content: Following the Air India crash involving a Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner in Ahmedabad, attorneys for Boeing whistleblower Sam Salehpour are urging the FAA to release its findings on alleged structural defects in Boeing's 787 aircraft. Salehpour had previously raised concerns about the integrity of Boeing's 787 and 777 planes, prompting an FAA investigation.

title: Gujarat plane crash: 'One of the darkest days in Tata Group's history', says chairman
content: Air India flight 171's crash, resulting in over 250 deaths, marks a dark chapter for the Tata Group, according to Chairman N Chandrasekaran. He assured full support and transparency in the investigation involving teams from India, the UK, and the US. The group is providing assistance to affected families, with Tata Trusts considering financial aid.

title: Isis plot: Pakistani extradited over NYC terror plan; Encrypted message warned of largest attack on US
content: Muhammad Shahzeb Khan, a Pakistani citizen residing in Canada, has been extradited to the U.S. for allegedly plotting an ISIS-inspired mass shooting at a New York City Jewish community center. The attack, planned for the anniversary of the October 7th Hamas attacks, was foiled through encrypted messaging app monitoring.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Just can't believe my luck, says 'The Man Who Lived'
content: Viswashkumar Ramesh, a British national, miraculously survived the Air India Dreamliner crash in Ahmedabad, escaping with minor injuries while all other passengers perished. Recounting the horrific experience from his hospital bed, Viswash described feeling the plane struggle immediately after takeoff before it crashed.

title: Assam: 70 families shifted after blast, gas leak at ONGC rig
content: A major gas leak at ONGC's Rudrasagar oilfield in Sivasagar, Assam, triggered widespread panic and the evacuation of 70 families. The incident occurred during routine operations by SK Petrochemicals, causing a high-pressure release of natural gas. Emergency protocols were activated, with SDRF and NDRF teams working to control the emission.

title: Lost in translation: Hindi statement sinks drug case in Tamil Nadu court
content: A Chennai court acquitted Nag Narayan Prasad in a narcotics case due to critical prosecution errors. The primary issue was the submission of a key witness statement in Hindi without translation, rendering it inadmissible. Further weakening the case, crucial witnesses were not examined, and digital evidence lacked proper certification, leading to the accused's release due to insufficient evidence.

title: Shoot-at-sight order at Assam border amid communal unrest
content: The Assam government has issued a shoot-at-sight order in Dhubri, a town bordering Bangladesh, following communal tensions. Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma cited a "communal group" attempting to destabilize the region, including alleged poster campaigns advocating for Dhubri's integration with Bangladesh.

title: Jammu and Kashmir: Row erupts over BJP call to drop Urdu criteria from test
content: A political clash has erupted in Jammu and Kashmir over the mandatory Urdu test for naib tehsildar recruitment. The BJP seeks to scrap the requirement, citing discrimination against Hindi and Punjabi speakers, while the PDP defends Urdu as a vital part of J&K's heritage and official language.

title: Maharashtra: After 'no non-Hindus' call, Shani temple fires 114 Muslim staff
content: The Shani Shingnapur shrine trust in Maharashtra dismissed 167 employees, citing non-performance and absenteeism. A significant portion, 68% of those laid off, were Muslims. This action followed threats from a Hindu group demanding the removal of non-Hindus from the shrine's workforce, though the trust denies any discriminatory intent, stating the dismissals were disciplinary.

title: 'I’ve been in this situation': Magic Johnson talks betrayal amid Lakers ownership buzz
content: NBA legend Magic Johnson recently revealed a past betrayal by a former Los Angeles Lakers coach during an appearance on ESPN's 'First Take.' While discussing the Lakers' playoff exit and potential future ownership changes, Johnson recalled the 1981-82 season when tensions with coach Paul Westhead led to his firing.

title: Kerala high court slams Centre over indecision on Wayanad loan relief
content: The Kerala High Court has criticized the Union government for its delayed response regarding loan waivers for victims of the July 2024 landslides in Wayanad. The Centre cited the omission of a section in the Disaster Management Act as a reason for its inaction.

title: 'Expect several waves of Iranian attacks': Netanyahu after Israeli strikes; US shifts warships
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced a strike on Iranian military and nuclear sites, anticipating retaliatory attacks. He stated the US was informed beforehand, leaving further action to President Trump. Netanyahu aims to cripple Iran's missile production, revealing the operation was delayed. Iran has condemned the strikes as a 'declaration of war,' while Trump warned of harsher attacks if nuclear negotiations fail.

title: Air India plane crash: For 44-yr-old, a rejig in travel plans proved fatal
content: Kalpana Prajapati from Manjalpur, Gujarat, tragically perished on a flight from Ahmedabad after delaying her trip to London to wait for her sister-in-law's visa approval. When the sister-in-law's visa was rejected, Kalpana booked a flight for June 12, a decision that ultimately led to her untimely death.

title: Uttar Pradesh blocks two Urs events citing law & order concerns
content: Authorities in Ayodhya and Barabanki, Uttar Pradesh, have denied permission for two annual Urs ceremonies, citing potential law and order issues. The Ayodhya denial followed a VHP complaint alleging the event was being held in the name of "Ghazi Baba," referencing Mahmud of Ghazni's military commander. Barabanki's denial stemmed from concerns about communal tension and unrest.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: For this Anand girl, a change of flight was a change of fate
content: Pinal Mistry, a 24-year-old from Anand, tragically became a victim of the Air India flight due to a last-minute change in her travel plans. She had been in India for dental treatment following a car accident and was returning to England to resume her online business. Her father, Suresh Mistry, is now awaiting DNA analysis to confirm the devastating news.

title: AI crash: It was to be a reunion in UK. Now, Vasad joint family mourns loss of 3 members
content: Rajnikant Patel, his wife Divya, and his sister-in-law Hemangini tragically died in a plane crash en route to the UK to celebrate their daughter Dhvani's graduation. The family, owners of Krishna Riverside Resort, were known for their hospitality and close-knit relationships.

title: J&K: Massive forest fire breaks out in Reasi; firefighting efforts underway
content: The fire, which had been raging for several days, prompted immediate action from forest authorities and emergency services as it threatened nearby villages and infrastructure, including the crucial national highway route.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Quick-thinking nanny saves 2-year-old
content: A mother's quick thinking and a nanny's bravery saved a two-year-old girl from a fire caused by the AI 171 crash at BJ Medical college hostel. The nanny moved the child to a higher floor to avoid smoke inhalation before rescuers asked them to jump to safety.

title: Air India plane crash: She got married 5 months ago, was set to join husband in London
content: Madan Singh's family in Faridabad is devastated after his daughter, Khushboo, perished in the Ahmedabad-London flight AI 171 crash shortly after takeoff. Khushboo, who recently married and was en route to join her husband in London, had just bid farewell to her father at the airport.

title: How precise was Israel's strike on Iran? 10 images show how it hit the bull's eye
content: In a stunning operation, Israeli forces launched a surprise assault on Iran, targeting key military and nuclear sites. The attack, aided by covert Mossad operations, involved smuggled weapons and internal sabotage, crippling Iranian defenses. Explosions rocked Tehran, Isfahan, and Qom, resulting in significant damage and the deaths of high-ranking Iranian officials.

title: From duck to 100! Markram shakes off failure, slams clutch century vs AUS; internet reacts
content: Aiden Markram's stunning century propelled South Africa to a dominant position in the World Test Championship final at Lord's after a shaky start. He defied critics with his remarkable innings, joining an elite group of players to score a duck and a century in the same Test at the iconic venue.

title: Forex buffer strengthens: India’s forex reserves rise $5.17 bn to $696.65 bn
content: India's foreign exchange reserves witnessed a substantial increase of $5.17 billion, reaching $696.65 billion for the week ending June 6, reversing the previous week's decline. This surge was fueled by gains in foreign currency assets and a significant rise in gold reserves. The robust reserve position is expected to bolster the RBI's efforts to stabilize the rupee amidst global volatility.

title: Larsa Pippen’s dating journey: From NBA stars to rappers post-divorce
content: Scottie and Larsa Pippen went through their divorce in 2021, which was followed by one of the many controversial relationships with Marcus Jordan. Larsa Pippen has a history of dating players from the NBA. She has also been linked to many high-end profile icons, such as The Rapper and Future.

title: Plane crash: When AI jet became fireball; how 1,000°C inferno made escape impossible
content: An Air India flight crashed in Ahmedabad near the airport. The crash occurred shortly after takeoff. The plane was carrying 242 passengers and crew. A massive fire erupted after the crash. Temperatures reached 1,000 degrees Celsius. Rescue operations were difficult due to the intense heat. Many bodies were recovered from the crash site. The incident also impacted nearby residential areas.

title: Op Rising Lion: How Israel tricked Iran's military leaders before striking
content: Israel escalated its conflict with Iran, reportedly tricking Iranian air force commanders into a meeting before launching a major attack. The strike targeted nuclear and military facilities, resulting in the deaths of several top Iranian military leaders and nuclear scientists. In retaliation, Iran launched 100 drones, most of which were intercepted, further heightening tensions as Iran advances its nuclear program.

title: WTC Final, AUS vs SA: Why has Steve Smith been taken to hospital?
content: Big setback for Australia. Steve Smith is out of the World Test Championship final. He injured his finger while fielding. The incident happened during South Africa's second innings. Smith was attempting a catch at first slip. He has been taken to the hospital for treatment. His participation in the West Indies tour is also uncertain.

title: India has adequate energy supplies, says Union minister Puri
content: Following the recent surge in global crude prices due to escalating tensions in the Middle East, Petroleum Minister Hardeep Singh Puri has assured that India possesses sufficient energy reserves for the upcoming months. He highlighted India's diversified energy sourcing strategy, ensuring affordability and sustainability.

title: Who did what on Day 1 of India’s intra-squad match?
content: India's intrasquad game in Beckenham saw Shubman Gill and KL Rahul scoring impressive half-centuries, showcasing their batting acumen ahead of the England Test series. Shardul Thakur's bowling stood out, as he exploited the conditions to claim crucial wickets. The team observed a minute's silence for the Air India plane crash victims, marking a sombre start to their preparations.

title: Black box found on hostel rooftop; key to uncovering why AI-171 crashed
content: In a significant development, the black box of the crashed Air India Ahmedabad-London flight has been recovered from a rooftop near the crash site. The tragic incident, which occurred shortly after take-off, claimed the lives of 241 individuals, including Gujarat's former chief minister, Vijay Rupani. An investigation has been launched to determine the cause of the crash.

title: Close shave: AI London-Delhi flight was in Iran airspace when Israel launched missile strike
content: Following Israeli strikes on Iranian military sites, Air India rerouted or turned back at least 16 international flights, including those from London, Toronto, and New York, due to the closure of Iranian airspace. Passengers faced significant disruptions, with the airline offering refunds and rescheduling options. The airline is offering full refunds or complimentary rescheduling to affected passengers and is arranging accommodation where necessary.

title: Shooting World Cup: Manu Bhaker flops; Suruchi Singh clinches gold
content: 19-year-old Indian shooter Suruchi Singh clinched gold in the Women's 10m Air Pistol event at the ISSF World Cup in Munich, surpassing France's Camille Jedrzejewski. This victory marks Suruchi's fourth gold and a hat-trick of individual wins. India's medal tally reached three, placing them fourth. Elavenil Valarivan and Sift Kaur Samra secured bronze medals in separate events.

title: Tesla price hike: Model S and X prices up by $5,000 in US after upgrades
content: Tesla has increased the prices of its Model S and Model X vehicles in the United States by $5,000 across all configurations. This price adjustment follows an update to these premium electric models.

title: Israel Says It Foiled Iran's '3-Point Plan', Gives Tehran A History Lesson
content: Iran has no option but to give up their quest to acquire a nuclear weapon and come to the table with clean hands to pursue a peaceful and responsible future, said Israel's Ambassador Reuven Azar.

title: Iran's Above-Ground Enrichment Plant At Natanz Destroyed: UN Nuclear Watchdog
content: The above-ground pilot enrichment plant at Iran's Natanz nuclear site has been destroyed, U.N. nuclear watchdog chief Rafael Grossi told a meeting of the U.N. Security Council on Friday on Israel's strikes on Iran.

title: Exclusive: Veteran Pilot Who Flew Same Dreamliner That Crashed Shares Insights
content: A senior commercial pilot who has flown the same Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner that crashed in Gujarat's Ahmedabad on Thursday spoke to NDTV for the first time in an exclusive interview on what may have gone wrong with the aircraft.

title: US Helping Israel Intercept Iranian Missiles: Report
content: The U.S. military has helped shoot down Iranian missiles that were headed toward Israel, two U.S. officials said on Friday.

title: As Israel Strikes Twice In Under 24 Hours, Iran Fires Barrage Of Missiles
content: Tehran has retaliated by firing a barrage of missiles after Israel launched a second offensive against Iran less than 24 hours since the first. Israel said it has hit more than 200 targets.

title: Middle East Airspace Shut After Israel Strikes Iran, Airlines Cancel Flights
content: Airlines steered clear of much of the Middle East on Friday after Israeli attacks on Iranian sites forced carriers to cancel or divert thousands of flights in the latest upheaval to travel in the region.

title: Macron Says Iran Destabilised Region, France Will Defend Israel
content: French President Emmanuel Macron said on Friday that Iran bore a heavy responsibility for destabilisation of the Middle East and that it had pushed ahead with an unjustified nuclear programme, but he also urged restraint after Israel struck Iran.

title: "Brilliant, Disciplined": Professor Remembers Co-Pilot Of Plane That Crashed
content: "Very difficult for me to digest the news," a professor of Clive Kunder, the co-pilot of the ill-fated Air India Ahmedabad-London flight, broke down as she remembered her "brilliant and disciplined" student.

title: Iran Fires Missiles At Israel In Response To Attacks
content: Explosions were heard over Tel Aviv and Jerusalem as sirens sounded on Friday night across Israel following what the country's military spokesman said was the firing of missiles from Iran.

title: Pizza Delivery Monitor Alerts To Secret Israel Attack
content: The timing of Israel's plan to attack Iran was top secret. But Washington pizza delivery trackers guessed something was up before the first bombs fell.

title: Israel Attacks Iran News LIVE: Israel Strikes Iran Again, Less Than 24 Hours After Destroying Nuclear Sites
content: Israel Attacks Iran Live Updates: A new explosion was heard at a key uranium enrichment site in central Iran on Friday morning, hours after Israel launched unprecedented air strikes against the Islamic Republic's nuclear programme.

title: Congress, BJP Conspiring To Defame KCR Over Irrigation Project: KTR
content: Telangana's BRS working president KT Rama Rao alleged that the Congress and BJP have conspired to defame former chief minister K Chandrasekhar Rao over the Kaleswaram lift irrigation project.

title: Not Concerned About War, Gave Iran 60 Days, Today's 61st: Trump Backs Israel
content: Donald Trump said on Friday that he is "not concerned" about a regional war breaking out after Israel targeted and destroyed Iran's military and nuclear sites, while also killing its top nuclear scientists and commanders.

title: Andhra Journalist Arrested For Defamatory Remark Made On Show Gets Bail
content: A journalist from Andhra Pradesh has been granted bail by the Supreme Court after being arrested for a derogatory comment made by a panellist on his show.

title: Gas Gushes From Assam ONGC Well For 2nd Day, Ops To Control Flow Continue
content: Gas is flowing uncontrollably for the second day in a row from an ONGC crude well in Assam's Sivasagar district after a blowout.

title: Two Jailed For Gold Toilet Heist At Churchill's Birthplace
content: Two men were jailed on Friday for stealing an 18-carat golden toilet that had been on display as an artwork in an exhibition at Winston Churchill's birthplace.

title: Heatwave Batters Rajasthan, Highest Temperature At 49.4 Degrees Celsius
content: Other significant highs included Lunkaransar (45.2 degrees Celsius), Pali and Fatehpur (45 degrees Celsius), Chittorgarh (44.9 degrees Celsius), Sangaria (44.6 degrees Celsius), and Jhunjhunu (44.5 degrees Celsius).

title: Arrests Of Non Criminal Immigrants Have Risen Eightfold Since Trump Took Office
content: The number of people booked into immigration detention who have been charged only with immigration violations has jumped eight-fold since President Donald Trump took office, government data shows, undercutting his anti-crime message.

title: Ahmedabad Plane Crash Live: Black Box Recovered, 10 From Medical Hostel Dead
content: Ahmedabad Air India Plane Crash Live Updates: A London-bound Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner crashed minutes after taking off from Ahmedabad airport, killing 241 people on board. Only one person survived.

title: AstraZeneca Inks China AI Research Deal For Chronic Diseases
content: British drugmaker AstraZeneca unveiled on Friday an AI-assisted research partnership with Chinese counterpart CSPC Pharmaceuticals worth up to $5.3 billion to tackle chronic diseases.

title: Mock draft: Achane among five RBs to go in top seven picks
content: In our first 12-team mock draft of the offseason, running backs took priority in the early going in this 1/2 PPR setup.

title: Bueckers, Loyd heading in different directions
content: Paige Bueckers' fantasy potential takes center stage this week while Jewell Lloyd hasn't quite lived up to expectations early in the season.

title: Caminero, Grisham hit 30 HRs? Turner steals 50? Don't be surprised
content: Eric Karabell looks into the crystal ball to tell fantasy baseball managers what might come to pass in the not-too-distant future.

title: Verstappen vows to 'race like I always do'
content: Max Verstappen vowed to "race like I always do" despite finding himself on the verge of a one-race ban.

title: Breaking down Team USA's U16 girls roster for the AmeriCup
content: From 2026's Olivia Jones to 2028's Tatianna Griffin, these 12 high school players competing at AmeriCup for Team USA.

title: Mya Lesnar, daughter to WWE legend Brock Lesnar, wins national title in shot put
content: Mya Lesnar secured a national championship in the women's shot put finals at the NCAA Outdoor Track and Field Championships on friday . on first attempt, mya recorded a mark of 19.01 meters (62 feet, 4 12 inches) and would stay in the lead the entire competition . the mark finished as much as five inches and a quarter ahead of the next best competitor .
